_header: I sing of kings by the days of Arthur
_description: Sir Lamwell — fragments in short couplets

CULKk530.First Lines:
Listine Lordings by the dayis off ArthureWas britan in grett
                    honoure…
CULKk530.Last Lines:
…nocht in the forest ther did sieAne rich Pavillione þer
                    picht sal lieEwrie pom
CULKk530.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Captain Cox., His Ballads and Books.
Ballad Society
         7 (1871); repr. New Shakespeare Society, 1890: xxxi.
